name: Archived
description: Use this status just prior to archiving a test case. Doing so allows you to find it quickly should it ever be un-archived in the future for editing.

name: Cleanup needed
description: Freshly imported or changes that need to be addressed. Test cases tagged with this status are not to be used until checked out by QA.

name: Being edited
description: Use this status when actively editing the test case(s) at hand. Can be left in this status over a period of time to allow work to be completed.

name: Manual
description: Identifies fully manual tests as well as test cases that may be automated in one environment but not all so manual tests are still needed.

name: Automated
description: Any test with this status is maintained in TM4J for reference but is not tested manually.

name: Active
description: Test case is in regular use

name: Update
description: Changes needed to the test case and/or automated script. Use this status when actively editing the test case(s) at hand. Can be left in this status over a period of time to allow work to be completed.
